TitlePage.Title: &kan;
TitlePage.Subtitle: A package for Induced Category Actions
TitlePage.Author: Anne Heyworth

Chris Wensley c.d.wensley@bangor.ac.uk http://www.bangor.ac.uk/~mas023/
School of Computer Science, Bangor University,
Dean Street, Bangor, Gwynedd, LL57 1UT, U.K.
TitlePage.Abstract:
The &kan; package was originally implemented in 1997 using the &GAP; 3 language, to compute induced actions of categories, when the first author was studying for a Ph.D. in Bangor.
This reduced version only provides functions for the computation of normal forms of representatives of double cosets of finitely presented groups.
Bug reports, suggestions and comments are, of course, welcome. Please contact the second author at c.d.wensley@bangor.ac.uk.
